original_text: Then Job took a piece of broken pottery and scraped himself with it as he sat among the ashes.
korean_text: 욥이 재 가운데 앉아서 질그릇 조각을 가져다가 몸을 긁고 있더니

sentences.original_text: Then Job took a piece of broken pottery
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 욥은 부서진 조각 그릇을 들고

sentences.original_text: as he sat among the ashes
